summary: The Saving NSF’s Workforce Act, introduced in the Senate, aims to prevent job cuts at the National Science Foundation (NSF). The bill imposes a moratorium on reductions in force (RIFs) at the NSF until the full-year appropriations for fiscal year 2026 are enacted into law. This legislation specifically references sections of United States Code related to RIFs and emphasizes that the moratorium is in addition to existing authorities regarding adverse personnel actions.
